name: Serpentine (itch) (idley)
description: This is very obviously my first game, made for the myfirstgamejam gamejam! I'm really grateful for this opportunity and for the support I've received during development. NOTE: YOU WILL PROBABLY NEED TO MAKE USE OF THE "R" (restart level) and "N" (next level) buttons. This game isn't hard, but its probably more than a little broken. At the very least you'll need to do some creative jumping at parts... Check out my devlog here and tumblr here for concept art and junk.
